text.author: Wikipedia
text.title: Yuen Ren Chao
text.summary: Yuen Ren Chao was a Chinese and American dialectologist and polyglot who sudied Chinese dialects and taught at Tsinghua University, Harvard and Berkeley between the 1920s and 1960s.
